title: Cache Test Start
narration: This is a short test trace to verify TTS caching across window reloads.

title: TTS Player cache
narration: Here we have the in-memory audio cache. After our fix, files on disk survive a reload.

title: Disk fallback
narration: This is the disk fallback check. If the in-memory cache misses, we look for the file on disk before hitting the API.
